content:
Here's my response from the user's perspective:

"Aww, yeah! Max loves to curl up in a ball and snuggle into the corner of his new bed. It's so adorable! Sometimes he'll even stick his nose into the corner and let out a little sigh of contentment. I've also caught him sleeping with his paws tucked under the bed, like he's trying to hug it. It's the sweetest thing! I'm so glad I got him this bed, it's definitely his happy place."
